name: Super Robot Taisen D
summary:
The 4th Super Robot Wars on the Game Boy Advance, D (Destiny) chronicles the battle against the Ruina. 
 
Super Robot Wars D is the fourth Super Robot Wars game for the GBA. Unlike its (traditional) predecessor, Super Robot Wars R, D offers a more diverse selection of anime series, getting rid of mainstays like G Gundam, Gundam 0083, Zambot 3/Daitarn 3 and Combattler V/Voltes V for debuting series like Daltanius, The Big O and Megazone 23.
